state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be great if you could travel south. Then, travel east. Then, venture north. Then, go north. With that over with, attempt to go east. Following that, try to travel south. After that, attempt to head east. And then, make an effort to travel north. After that, head east. Okay, and then, attempt to go to the north. That done, attempt to move west. And then, make an effort to venture north. And then, move west. After that, take the scarf from the rack. And once you've done that, you win! -= Office =- You are in an office. A standard kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You make out a safe. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. > -= Office =-0/1
